articles.title: Elon Musk loses $56billion in a lawsuit filed by a heavy metal drummer - NME
articles.description: Elon Musk's $56 billion Tesla pay package was recently tossed out by a Delaware judge due to a lawsuit filed by a heavy metal drummer.
articles.content:
Elon Musk’s $56billion Tesla pay package was recently tossed out by a Delaware judge due to a lawsuit filed by a heavy metal drummer.

articles.title: Investors pull ExxonMobil climate motion after oil supermajor sues - Financial Times
articles.description: Follow This and Arjuna Capital had called on US company to set more ambitious climate targets
articles.content:
Investors have withdrawn a climate resolution at ExxonMobil after the oil supermajor sued them, in a retreat likely to have a chilling effect on similar forms of shareholder activism.
